Resources

This page is a repository of “resources” of various types, collected in one place. These include software bits I’ve written (mostly Stata), datasets and miscellaneous documents (mainly in spanish).

Software

Although I code in R, Matlab and Python, I believe my only worthy collaborations to the world are LaTeX and Stata programs. Here’s a list of them:

Stata programs

  • psestimate – Estimate the propensity score proposed by Imbens and Rubin (2015). Available at my git repo.
  • randtreat – Random treatment assignment with unequal treatment fractions and dealing with misfits. Available at the SSC archive or at my git repo.
  • nrow – Rename variables as their n-th row values. Available at the SSC archive or at my git repo.
Alvaro Carril

Economist / Research analyst at J-PAL
